languages.text: "Поле боя выглядит крайне подозрительно. Половина твоих соратников даже не успела достать оружие. И направление выстрелов — те, кто их атаковал, точно знали, где будет идти группа и сколько их".

"The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even had the chance to draw their weapons. And the direction of the shots, as well — the attackers knew exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."
languages.original_text: "Поле боя выглядит крайне подозрительно. Половина твоих соратников даже не успела достать оружие. И направление выстрелов — те, кто их атаковал, точно знали, где будет идти группа и сколько их".

traits.locale_text: "The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even drew their weapons. And the direction of the shots, too: those who attacked them had known exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."

"The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even drew their weapons. And the direction of the shots, too: those who attacked them had known exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."

"The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even had the chance to drew their weapons. And where the shots came from, too. The attackers knew exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."

"The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even had the chance to drew their weapons. And where the shots came from, too. The attackers knew exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."

"The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even had the chance to draw their weapons. And the direction of the shots, as well — the attackers knew exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."

"The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even had the chance to draw their weapons. And the direction of the shots, as well — the attackers knew exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."

languages.text: "Das Schlachtfeld sieht sehr verdächtig aus. Die Hälfte Eurer Kameraden hatte nicht einmal die Gelegenheit, die Waffe zu ziehen. Und auch die Richtung, aus der die Schüsse kamen. Die Angreifer wussten genau, welchen Weg die Gruppe nehmen würde, und wie groß sie sein würde."
languages.original_text: "The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even had the chance to draw their weapons. And the direction of the shots, as well — the attackers knew exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."

traits.locale_text: "Das Schlachtfeld sieht sehr verdächtig aus. Die Hälfte Eurer Kameraden hatte nicht einmal die Gelegenheit, die Waffe zu ziehen. Und auch die Richtung, aus der die Schüsse kamen. Die Angreifer wussten genau, welchen Weg die Gruppe nehmen würde, und wie groß sie sein würde."

languages.text: « Le champ de bataille me paraît très suspect. La moitié de vos camarades n'a même pas eu le temps de dégainer leurs armes. Et il y a aussi la direction d'où venaient les tirs. Les assaillants savaient exactement quel chemin suivrait le groupe et de combien d'hommes il serait composé. »
languages.original_text: "The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even had the chance to draw their weapons. And the direction of the shots, as well — the attackers knew exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."

traits.locale_text: « Le champ de bataille me paraît très suspect. La moitié de vos camarades n'a même pas eu le temps de dégainer leurs armes. Et il y a aussi la direction d'où venaient les tirs. Les assaillants savaient exactement quel chemin suivrait le groupe et de combien d'hommes il serait composé. »

languages.text: “战场的情况看起来相当可疑。你有一半的战友甚至没来得及拔出武器就被杀了。交火的痕迹也相当可疑，看起来，那些袭击者很清楚这支队伍的规模和路线。”
languages.original_text: "The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even had the chance to draw their weapons. And the direction of the shots, as well — the attackers knew exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."

traits.locale_text: “战场的情况看起来相当可疑。你有一半的战友甚至没来得及拔出武器，也没弄清楚敌人是从哪边开火的就被杀了。看起来，那些袭击者很清楚这支队伍的规模和路线。”

languages.text: 「戦場は非常に怪しい。仲間の半分は武器を引き抜く暇すらなかった。そして、どこから撃たれたのかも怪しい。襲撃者たちは、一団がどの経路を取り、どれほどの規模かを正確に把握していたようだ」
languages.original_text: "The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even had the chance to draw their weapons. And the direction of the shots, as well — the attackers knew exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."

traits.locale_text: 「戦場は非常に怪しい。仲間の半分は武器を引き抜く暇すらなかった。そして、どこから撃たれたのかも怪しい。襲撃者たちは、一団がどの経路を取り、どれほどの規模かを正確に知っていたようだ」

languages.text: «El campo de batalla parece muy sospechoso. La mitad de sus camaradas ni siquiera tuvieron la oportunidad de desenfundar sus armas. El origen de los disparos también es llamativo. Los atacantes sabían exactamente qué camino tomaría el grupo y qué tamaño tendría».
languages.original_text: "The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even had the chance to draw their weapons. And the direction of the shots, as well — the attackers knew exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."

traits.locale_text: «El campo de batalla parece muy sospechoso. La mitad de sus camaradas ni siquiera tuvieron la oportunidad de desenfundar sus armas. Y también de dónde procedían los disparos. Los atacantes sabían exactamente qué camino tomaría el grupo y qué tamaño tendría».

languages.text: "Savaş meydanı fazlasıyla şüphe uyandırıcı. Yoldaşlarının yarısı, silahlarını çekmeye bile fırsat bulamamış. Ayrıca atışların geldiği yöne bakılırsa saldıran taraf, grubun hangi yoldan geleceğini ve kaç kişi olduklarını net olarak biliyormuş."
languages.original_text: "The battlefield looks highly suspicious. Half of your comrades never even had the chance to draw their weapons. And the direction of the shots, as well — the attackers knew exactly what path the group would take and how large it would be."

traits.locale_text: "Savaş meydanı fazlasıyla şüphe uyandırıcı. Yoldaşlarının yarısı, silahlarını çekmeye bile fırsat bulamamış. Ayrıca atışların geldiği yöne bakılırsa saldıran taraf, grubun hangi yoldan geleceğini ve kaç kişi olduklarını net olarak biliyormuş."
